sources.title: Le prigioniere dell'isola del diavolo (1962)
sources.description: The plot follows a noblewoman who, convicted of treason for political reasons, is sentenced to life imprisonment on Devil’s Island, a notorious penal colony for women near French Guyana. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/le-prigioniere-dellisola-del-diavolo-1962/
